main event: A witness observed a UFO resembling an upside-down bowl in the sky on June 6, 1957, around 11 o'clock.
interesting points: The object displayed a pulsating red light that alternated between bright and dim every 15 seconds,The object was observed for about one and a half minutes,It was flying at an altitude between 500 and 1000 feet,The object flew out of sight behind a house,Three photographs were reportedly taken of the object.
sighted object: an upside-down bowl shaped object with pulsating red light
witness description: a person who observed and photographed the object
